info.description: REST API para gerenciamento de salas
info.title: API ROOMS

post.description: Authenticate user with email and password
Create a new note in a room

get.description: Get all notes created by the current user
Get all notes in a specific room

put.description: Update note information (only by note creator)

get.description: Retrieve list of all available rooms

post.description: Create a new room and automatically join as creator

get.description: Get list of rooms the current user is a member of
Retrieve detailed room information including members and notes

put.description: Update room information (only by room creator)

delete.description: Leave a room you're currently in

get.description: Retrieve user information by user ID
Retrieve user information by email address

put.description: Update user information by user ID

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
